title: import error with v0.3 binary
body_html:
I got an import error after installing v0.3 binary. Installed pytorch via conda using python3.5.

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
File "/home/mingdachen/anaconda2/envs/py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 56, in
from torch._C import *
ImportError: libmkl_gf_lp64.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

body:
I got an import error after installing v0.3 binary. Installed pytorch via conda using python3.5.

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/mingdachen/anaconda2/envs/py35/lib/python3.5/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 56, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: libmkl_gf_lp64.so: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
